Author: David A. Wood
Title: Tesla Pre-Owned Warranty Class Action Lawsuit is Over
Text:
Tesla owners claim they didn't receive the results of certified pre-owned vehicle inspections.
 September 5, 2022 — A Tesla pre-owned warranty class action lawsuit is over after a plaintiff sued in 2019 by alleging used Model S and Model X warranties are practically worthless.
 Lead plaintiff Hugh Nguyen says he believed the used Model S car he purchased would get about 200 miles per full charge at 100% battery capacity, but the battery could take the car only 165 miles on a full charge.
 He brought the Model S to Tesla technicians multiple times but Tesla allegedly could not repair the battery.
Title_without_stopwords: Tesla Pre-Owned Warranty Class Action Lawsuit Over
Text_without_stopwords: Tesla owners claim n't receive results certified pre-owned vehicle inspections . September 5 , 2022 — A Tesla pre-owned warranty class action lawsuit plaintiff sued 2019 alleging used Model S Model X warranties practically worthless . Lead plaintiff Hugh Nguyen says believed used Model S car purchased would get 200 miles per full charge 100 % battery capacity , battery could take car 165 miles full charge . He brought Model S Tesla technicians multiple times Tesla allegedly could repair battery .

Author: Brian Potter
Title: Watch Tesla vehicle production and deliveries visualised in 3D
Text: Tesla is not only an EV pioneer but the world's largest battery-electric car manufacturer, which accustomed us to amazing and quite consistent growth. Here is a presentation of Tesla vehicle production and deliveries for each year since 2014, in a 3D real scale on a background of a large city. Tesla was started in 2003, while the first Tesla Roadster cars were delivered in 2008. That gives us glimpses of how significantly the company expanded, from just a few thousand units in 2012 to over 936,000 in 2021.

Author: Fred Lambert
Title: Tesla prepares launch in Thailand with hiring spree
Text:
Tesla is preparing to launch its electric vehicles in Thailand for the first time with a significant hiring spree. It has been a little while since Tesla has expanded into a brand-new market. The company was trying hard to enter the Indian market for years, but the effort was put on hold earlier this year after negotiations with the government stalled.
A few weeks later, we learned that Tesla's new market team turned its attention to Southeast Asia, and more specifically Thailand.
The automaker filed to register its product for sale in the country.
Title_without_stopwords: Tesla prepares launch Thailand hiring spree
Text_without_stopwords: Tesla preparing launch electric vehicles Thailand first time significant hiring spree . It little since Tesla expanded brand-new market . The company trying hard enter Indian market years , effort put hold earlier year negotiations government stalled . A weeks later , learned Tesla 's new market team turned attention Southeast Asia , specifically Thailand . The automaker filed register product sale country .

Title: Elon Musk: Tesla Powerwall Only Available with Solar Bundle, Supply is Low But Coming Soon
Text: Isaiah Richard, Tech Times 05 September 2022, 10:09 pm Elon Musk is advertising the Tesla Powerwall to the public, and it talks about the use of the clean energy power management system at home that provides 'blackout protection' for all. However, there is a catch now in purchasing the Powerwall, as Tesla requires a bundle purchase for it with the company's Solar Roof device as stocks are low for the home battery storage system. Author: Fred Lambert
Title: Tesla is still having issues ramping up 4680 battery cell production, report says
Text:
Tesla is still having some issues in ramping up production of its new 4680 battery cell and especially its dry-coating technology, according to an interesting albeit strange new report. Reuters is out today with a new report on Tesla's effort to ramp up production of its 4680 battery cell.
It's a bit difficult to determine the level of credibility of the report because Reuters is being a bit vague about its sources, only saying that it talked to '12 battery experts' with some of them having 'close ties to Tesla': 

Among the 12 battery experts Reuters spoke with, nine have close ties to Tesla and three of the nine have examined Tesla's new and old battery technology inside and out through teardowns.
Title_without_stopwords: Tesla still issues ramping 4680 battery cell production , report says
Text_without_stopwords: Tesla still issues ramping production new 4680 battery cell especially dry-coating technology , according interesting albeit strange new report . Reuters today new report Tesla 's effort ramp production 4680 battery cell . It 's bit difficult determine level credibility report Reuters bit vague sources , saying talked '12 battery experts ' 'close ties Tesla ' : Among 12 battery experts Reuters spoke , nine close ties Tesla three nine examined Tesla 's new old battery technology inside teardowns .

Author: Al Root
Title: Moody's Doesn't Want To Upgrade Tesla Debt Until This Happens.
Text: Patrick Pleul/POOL/AFP via Getty Images Shareholders of electric vehicle giant Tesla would probably like to see their company's debt upgraded from the speculative category into the ranks of investment grade companies. They might have to wait a little longer. A few days ago, an email exchange surfaced on Twitter (ticker: TWTR) between a Tesla shareholder and a former employee of Moody's employee, and the ratings agency. Barron's reviewed the email exchange. Moody's was urged to upgrade Tesla's debt given its recent strong financial position and cash flow generation, among other reasons.
Title_without_stopwords: Moody 's Does n't Want To Upgrade Tesla Debt Until This Happens .

Author: Rahma Yuli
Title: Diperkirakan, Microchip Tesla Lebih Pintar dari Otak Manusia
Text: Mobil Tesla (Foto: Istimewa) Deli.Suara.com – Sebuah studi baru oleh perusahaan leasing, Vanarama mengungkapkan, pada 2023 nanti, mobil Tesla akan lebih pintar lagi, bahkan lebih dari manusia. Saat ini, satu mobil Tesla menggunakan beberapa chip dan microchip dengan kekuatan pemrosesan yang kuat. Namun, inovasi Tesla tampaknya tidak akan berhenti di microchip yang sekadar kuat. Menurut laporan terbaru, pengembangan microchip Tesla akan mencapai level tertinggi dalam beberapa tahun mendatang. Vanarama menganalisis kekuatan pemrosesan microchip Tesla dan menemukan microchip Tesla akan melampaui otak manusia (1 kuadriliun operasi per detik) dalam 11 tahun, tepatnya 2033.

Saat ini , satu mobil Tesla menggunakan beberapa chip dan microchip dengan kekuatan pemrosesan yang kuat . Namun , inovasi Tesla tampaknya tidak akan berhenti di microchip yang sekadar kuat . Author: Voir tous ses articles
Title: La nouvelle Tesla Model Y Propulsion est-elle la bonne affaire de la rentrée ?
Text:
Son arrivée en France ne va sans doute pas passer inaperçue, et pour cause : la Tesla Model Y Propulsion devient la voiture la plus abordable de la firme d'Elon Musk. Faisons ensemble le point sur ses caractéristiques, sur la concurrence et tentons de définir si elle est bel et bien la bonne affaire du moment. Source : Tesla
La Tesla Model Y a été introduite en Europe il y a tout juste un an, et nous avions testé à cette occasion la version Grande Autonomie. Depuis, les premières livraisons de Tesla Model Y Performance fabriquées à la Gigafactory de Berlin ont eu lieues, mais Tesla n'en a pas encore terminé avec son SUV familial : une version Propulsion vient tout juste d'arriver sur le configurateur en ligne en Europe.

Author: Norihiko Shirouzu
Title: Inside Tesla's drive to keep Musk's battery promise
Text:
Inside Tesla's drive to keep Musk's battery promise FILE PHOTO: Tesla Inc CEO Elon Musk and Shanghai's Mayor Ying Yong attend an opening ceremony for Tesla China-made Model Y program in Shanghai

By Norihiko Shirouzu and Paul Lienert

(Reuters) - The secret behind Elon Musk's goal of selling 20 million Tesla's a year by 2030 lies in its pioneering battery technology.

The good news is that by using bigger cells and a new process to dry-coat electrodes, Tesla could halve the cost of a Model Y battery, saving more than 8% of the car's U.

Author: Melanie Schaffer
Title: Tesla Motors (TSLA) – A Look At Tesla Stock As Investors Await Post-Labor Day Market Shift
Text: Tesla, Inc TSLA was trading flat in the premarket on Tuesday after a volatile Friday caused the stock to gap up 1.41% when the market opened, only to run into sellers who dropped the stock down 3.86% intraday.Retail traders who kept up with the market during the summer months are looking forward to opportunities that seasonally present themself after the Labor Day weekend, when big money often returns and companies begin to increase their news flow.Tesla investors are anticipating an announcement on a new Gigafactory before year end, with some believing Quebec, Canada could offer a prime location.

Author: Dennis Austinat
Title: Aktien: Tesla will gesamte Autobranche überflügeln
Text:
Anzeige / Werbung

Tesla-Chef Elon Musk will den Rest der Autoindustrie überholen und 20 Millionen E-Autos bis 2030 absetzen. Doch dafür wären nicht nur Milliardeninvestitionen notwendig, sondern auch große Mengen an Rohstoffen.

Tesla käme auf einen Marktanteil von einem Fünftel, doppelt so viel wie die größten Hersteller heute. Im Vergleich zu den angepeilten 1,5 Millionen Tesla-Auslieferungen in diesem Jahr würde der Elektroautopionier um den Faktor 13 wachsen. Tesla müsste noch sieben oder acht weitere Gigafabriken zur Batterieproduktion aus dem Boden stampfen, jährlich eine.

Author: Investing.com
Title: Tesla Removes Type 2 Charging Cables in Hong Kong By Investing.com
Text:
© Reuters. Tesla (TSLA) Removes Type 2 Charging Cables in Hong Kong

By Michael Elkins

A recent report from insideevs.com claims 'a number of Tesla (NASDAQ: ) Model S and Model X owners' have noticed some V2 Supercharging locations are missing the Type 2 cables, leaving only the CCS2 cable available for charging.

Type 2 cables have been available in Hong Kong since the launch of Model S back in 2014. Dual cable Tesla Superchargers were deployed at new locations just before the Model 3 sedan began delivery in 2019.

Author: Marko Čavić
Title: OTKRIVENI NOVI TESLA UREĐAJI U BERLINU: Srpska kompanija iskoristila odličan trenutak za promociju
Text:
Na IFA sajmu u Berlinu Tesla je prikazala potpuno nove serije uređaja i proširen portfolio dosad dostupnih serija proizvoda.





Izvor: Tesla / Milena Đorđević


SmartLife ekipa provela je šest dana na IFA sajmu i već smo vam preneli neke od utisaka sa najveće evropske "smotre" potrošačke elektronike.

Sajam kao takav nije ostavio izuzetan utisak kao onaj 2019. godine ili bilo koji pre njega, ali smo videli par sjajnih nastupa, koji su bljesnuli u sveopštoj letargiji među većinom proizvođača koji su bili prisutni na IFA 2022.

Author: Simon Alvarez
Title: Tesla Semi sightings are becoming more common
Text: Prior to customer deliveries of a new vehicle, Tesla tends to test an increasing number of prototypes on public roads. This was the case with the Model Y prior to its release date, and now, this seems to be the case with the Tesla Semi as well. As per recent observations from the EV community, Tesla Semi sightings seem to be getting more common. Just recently, for example, EV advocate Shoaib Quraishi posted a video of a Tesla Semi sighting that featured three of the vehicles in one location. As could be seen in the video, two of the Tesla Semi were pulling trailers behind them while one was bobtailing.

Author: Al Root
Title: Tesla Stock Could Climb 30% Because of New Tax Credits, Analyst Says
Text: Patrick. T Fallon/AFP via Getty Images Tesla stock picked up another upgrade Tuesday morning. This one because tax credits for electric vehicle purchase will boost demand for new EV car sales. Wolfe Research analyst Rod Lache upgraded shares of the EV giant to Buy from Hold. He didn't have an official price target with his Hold rating. Now his price target is $360 a share. T esla stock closed out this past week at $270.21. Tesla (ticker: TSLA) is up about 0.8% in premarket trading Tuesday. S&P 500 and Dow Jones Industrial Average futures are both up about 0.

Author: Felix Gräber
Title: Großer Rückruf bei Tesla: Alle E-Auto-Modelle sind betroffen
Text:
Tesla ist der erste Name, wann immer es um E-Autos geht. Nach Meinung vieler E-Mobilisten bauen die Amerikaner die besten Elektroautos der Welt. Das heißt aber noch lange nicht, dass immer alles glatt läuft. Von einem aktuellen Rückruf sind hunderttausende Teslas weltweit betroffen, auch deutsche Tesla-Fahrer müssen mit ihren E-Autos in die Werkstatt.
 Rückruf bei Tesla: Model S, 3, X und Y müssen in die Werkstatt
Während ausgerechnet Tesla-Chef Elon Musk die Welt darauf einschwört, dass wir noch auf lange Sicht nicht auf fossile Brennstoffe wie Öl und Gas werden verzichten können, müssen Tesla-Kunden sich ihre Elektroautos einmal genau ansehen.
Title_without_stopwords: Großer Rückruf bei Tesla : Alle E-Auto-Modelle sind betroffen
Text_without_stopwords: Tesla ist der erste Name , wann immer es um E-Autos geht . Nach Meinung vieler E-Mobilisten bauen die Amerikaner die besten Elektroautos der Welt . Das heißt aber noch lange nicht , dass immer alles glatt läuft . Von einem aktuellen Rückruf sind hunderttausende Teslas weltweit betroffen , auch deutsche Tesla-Fahrer müssen mit ihren E-Autos die Werkstatt . Rückruf bei Tesla : Model S , 3 , X und Y müssen die Werkstatt Während ausgerechnet Tesla-Chef Elon Musk die Welt darauf einschwört , dass wir noch auf lange Sicht nicht auf fossile Brennstoffe wie Öl und Gas werden verzichten können , müssen Tesla-Kunden sich ihre Elektroautos einmal genau ansehen .
Label: Unknown

Author: Fred Lambert
Title: Elon Musk hints at Tesla finally increasing Powerwall availability
Text:
Elon Musk is signaling that Tesla is ramping up Powerwall production and will finally increase the availability of the home battery pack. Tesla has been production constrained with the Powerwall for a long time.
The demand has been strong in several markets, like the US and Australia, but production hasn't been able to catch up despite significant ramp-ups.
As we previously reported, it took Tesla about five years to deploy the first 100,000 Powerwalls, and then it deployed 100,000 more home battery packs in 2020 alone.
Title_without_stopwords: Elon Musk hints Tesla finally increasing Powerwall availability
Text_without_stopwords: Elon Musk signaling Tesla ramping Powerwall production finally increase availability home battery pack . Tesla production constrained Powerwall long time . The demand strong several markets , like US Australia , production n't able catch despite significant ramp-ups . As previously reported , took Tesla five years deploy first 100,000 Powerwalls , deployed 100,000 home battery packs 2020 alone .
Label: Unknown

Author: Asit Tripathy
Title: Inside Tesla's drive to keep Musk's battery promise
Text: The secret behind Elon Musk's goal of selling 20 million Tesla's a year by 2030 lies in its pioneering battery technology. The good news is that by using bigger cells and a new process to dry-coat electrodes, Tesla could halve the cost of a Model Y battery, saving more than 8% of the car's U.S. starting price, battery experts with ties to the company said. The bad news is that it's only halfway there, according to 12 experts close to Tesla or familiar with its new technology. That's because the dry-coating technique used to produce the bigger cells in Tesla's 4680 battery is so new and unproven the company is having trouble scaling up manufacturing to the point where the big cost savings kick in, the experts told Reuters.
Title_without_stopwords: Inside Tesla 's drive keep Musk 's battery promise
Text_without_stopwords: The secret behind Elon Musk 's goal selling 20 million Tesla 's year 2030 lies pioneering battery technology . The good news using bigger cells new process dry-coat electrodes , Tesla could halve cost Model Y battery , saving 8 % car 's U.S. starting price , battery experts ties company said . The bad news 's halfway , according 12 experts close Tesla familiar new technology . That 's dry-coating technique used produce bigger cells Tesla 's 4680 battery new unproven company trouble scaling manufacturing point big cost savings kick , experts told Reuters .

Author: Emirhan Doğan
Title: Tesla Model X Fiyat Listesi ve Özellikleri
Text:
Tesla, günümüzdeki en popüler otomobil firmalarından bir tanesi. Bu popülerliğini maksimum güç ve teknoloji odaklı ürettiği otomobilleri ve Elon Musk'ın farklı dallarda olan aktifliğinden alıyor. Farklı özelliklere, motor seçeneklerine ve performanslara sahip modelleri barındıran Tesla'dan bugünün konusu Tesla Model X ve onun efsanevi özellikleri. Bununla birlikte Tesla Model X Türkiye'de ne kadar? gibi soruları da bu içeriğimizle birlikte yanıtlamış olacağız.
Tesla Model X özellikleri bakımından inanılmaz derecede güçlü ve bununla birlikte, motor performans konusunda da şu an aklınıza gelebilecek çoğu yarış otomobili ile yarışacak kapasitede.

Title: Tesla Stock a Buy With New Tax Credits Coming, Says Analyst
Text: Patrick. T Fallon/AFP via Getty Images Tesla stock picked up another upgrade Tuesday morning. This one because tax credits for electric vehicle purchase will boost demand for new EV car sales. Wolfe Research analyst Rod Lache upgraded shares of the EV giant to Buy from Hold. He didn't have an official price target with his Hold rating. Now his price target is $360 a share. T esla stock closed out this past week at $270.21. Tesla (ticker: TSLA) is up about 0.8% in premarket trading Tuesday. S&P 500 and Dow Jones Industrial Average futures are both up about 0.

Author: aktiencheck.de AG
Title: Tesla: Zahlen aus China sorgen für gute Laune
Text:
Kulmbach (www.aktiencheck.de) - Tesla-Aktienanalyse von "Der Aktionär":

Timo Nützel vom Anlegermagazin "Der Aktionär" nimmt in einer aktuellen Aktienanalyse die Aktie des US-Elektroautoherstellers Tesla Inc. (ISIN: US88160R1014, WKN: A1CX3T, Ticker-Symbol: TL0, NASDAQ-Symbol: TSLA) unter die Lupe.

Bei der Tesla-Aktie sehe es momentan nicht allzu gut aus. Erst kürzlich habe sie ihre Doppel-Top-Formation nach unten aufgelöst und damit ein Verkaufssignal generiert. Zudem sei das Papier am Freitag im Zuge des schwachen Gesamtmarkts unter Druck geraten.

Author: Anthony Di Pizio
Title: 1 Stock-Split Stock Set to Soar 641% From Its 52-Week Low, According to Cathie Wood
Text:
Technology has been one of the worst-performing sectors in the stock market this year, which is in stark contrast to its monster gains during 2020 and 2021. Not even prolific tech investor Cathie Wood has escaped the carnage. Wood is the head of Ark Investment Management, and its flagship Ark Innovation ETF (ARKK -2.71%) has lost 57% of its value this year.
Ark is known for investing in innovative companies with long-term time horizons, and despite the Ark Innovation ETF suffering steep losses this year, it has still more than doubled since its inception in 2014.

Author: The Star Online
Title: Tesla launches recruitment drive in Bangkok
Text: BANGKOK (The Nation/Asia News Network): Electric vehicle maker Tesla has launched a recruitment drive in Bangkok as part of plans to penetrate the EV market in Thailand. Tesla's website on Monday (Sept 5) was advertising 16 positions ranging from public policy & business development manager to store manager, service manager, vehicle technician and adviser. The move comes after Tesla registered as a company in Thailand on April 25. Tesla said it will operate a Thai business related to EVs, mounted energy storage and energy generation with initial registered capital of 3 million baht.

Author: Mohit Oberoi
Title: The Biggest Threat for Tesla Could Come from Apple
Text:
Tesla is among the biggest success stories in recent years. Its market cap surpassed $1 trillion last year and it became the first automaker globally to achieve that feat. So far, none of the legacy automakers has been able to challenge the company's dominance.

Tesla's CEO Elon Musk has mocked legacy automakers multiple times, and in the past and compared gasoline cars to steam engines. That said, legacy automakers are also now pivoting towards electric cars and are quickly ramping up their production.

That said , legacy automakers also pivoting towards electric cars quickly ramping production .

Author: Reuters
Title: Inside Tesla's drive to keep Musk's battery promise
Text: The secret behind Elon Musk's goal of selling 20 million Tesla's a year by 2030 lies in its pioneering battery technology. The good news is that by using bigger cells and a new process to dry-coat electrodes, Tesla could halve the cost of a Model Y battery, saving more than 8% of the car's U.S. starting price, battery experts with ties to the company said. The bad news is that it's only halfway there, according to 12 experts close to Tesla or familiar with its new technology. That's because the dry-coating technique used to produce the bigger cells in Tesla's 4680 battery is so new and unproven that the company is having trouble scaling up manufacturing to the point where the big cost savings kick in, the experts told Reuters.
Title_without_stopwords: Inside Tesla 's drive keep Musk 's battery promise

The bad news 's halfway , according 12 experts close Tesla familiar new technology . That 's dry-coating technique used produce bigger cells Tesla 's 4680 battery new unproven company trouble scaling manufacturing point big cost savings kick , experts told Reuters .

Author: David A. Wood
Title: Tesla Sues the Louisiana Automobile Dealers Association
Text:
Lawsuit argues Louisiana blocks the freedom of consumers to purchase electric vehicles.
 September 5, 2022 — The state of Louisiana doesn't want Tesla to sell electric vehicles directly to Louisiana consumers, something that doesn't sit well with the automaker.
 In a lawsuit against the Louisiana Automobile Dealers Association and others, Tesla argues Louisiana is guilty of violating antitrust laws which take away the freedom of Louisiana consumers.
 According to Tesla, Louisiana car dealers and the state dealer association have conspired to block Tesla from selling direct to Louisiana consumers.

Title: Labor board rules Tesla must let workers wear union clothing
Text:
DETROIT (AP) — The National Labor Relations Board has reversed a Trump-era decision by finding that Tesla can't stop factory employees from wearing clothing with union insignia while on the job.
The board, in a 3-2 decision released Monday, overruled a 2019 NLRB decision involving Walmart and union clothing. The board wrote that a 1945 Supreme Court decision established the precedent for allowing the clothing.
It ordered Tesla to stop enforcing an 'overly broad' uniform policy that effectively stops production workers at Tesla's Fremont, California, factory from wearing black shirts with the United Auto Workers union's logo.
Title_without_stopwords: Labor board rules Tesla must let workers wear union clothing

The board , 3-2 decision released Monday , overruled 2019 NLRB decision involving Walmart union clothing . The board wrote 1945 Supreme Court decision established precedent allowing clothing . It ordered Tesla stop enforcing 'overly broad ' uniform policy effectively stops production workers Tesla 's Fremont , California , factory wearing black shirts United Auto Workers union 's logo .

Author: Efe Udin
Title: Tesla is about to enter the Thai market
Text: American electric car manufacturer, Tesla, is one of the top electric car brands in the world. The company ships millions of electric cars annually and has a number of gigafactories. At the moment, the company has gigafactories in Texas, Shanghai and Berlin. With these factories and other assembly plants, the company hopes to have sufficient units to expand to other regions. In order to meet the demand, the carmaker had to upgrade its Shanghai gigafactory. The company was able to successfully complete the production line upgrade in early August.

Author: Aldgra Fredly
Title: Tesla Signals Launch in Thailand With Job Openings
Text:
Tesla has launched a recruitment drive in Thailand, its website shows, signaling an expansion of the American electric vehicle (EV) manufacturing company in the Southeast Asia automotive hub.
Tesla advertised 16 Bangkok-based job postings on its website on Monday, offering job roles such as home-charging developer, service manager, parts advisor, delivery operations advisor, and vehicle technician.
Tesla's entry into Thailand is aligned with the government's goal to boost the use of EVs in the country and produce 725,000 EVs annually by 2030.

Author: Mohit Oberoi
Title: Tesla Is a Big Beneficiary of Inflation Reduction Act, Wolfe Says
Text:
According to Wolfe Research, Tesla (NYSE: TSLA) would stand to gain from the Inflation Reduction Act. Wolfe upgraded TSLA stock and raised its target price, joining the list of other brokerages who have been turning bullish on the EV (electric vehicle) company.

Last month, US President Joe Biden signed the Inflation Reduction Act. While the Act has many provisions, it also has several measures to increase EV adoption in the US. Previously, EV buyers in the US got a federal tax credit of up to $7,500.

Author: news aktuell
Title: MEYLE Ingenieure lösen Teslas Quietsch-Problem / Automechanika-Neuheit                    MEYLE präsentiert verbesserten Querlenker für Tesla Model 3 und Model Y (FOTO)
Text:
Hamburg (ots) - Quietscht der Tesla an der Vorderachse, ist das nicht nur
unerwartet für die sonst so leisen Premium-Elektroautos, sondern es weckt auch
den Ehrgeiz der MEYLE Ingenieure aus Hamburg. Nachdem seit Anfang des Jahres
mehr und mehr Tesla-Fahrer aus der ganzen Welt von störenden Quietschgeräuschen
bei Fahrzeugen der Reihen Model 3 und Model Y berichteten, präsentiert der
Ersatzteilhersteller MEYLE AG ( http://www.meyle.com/ ) auf der Automechanika
2022 die Lösung: den neuen MEYLE HD-Querlenker für Tesla Model 3 und Model Y.
Title_without_stopwords: MEYLE Ingenieure lösen Teslas Quietsch-Problem / Automechanika-Neuheit MEYLE präsentiert verbesserten Querlenker für Tesla Model 3 und Model Y ( FOTO )
Text_without_stopwords: Hamburg ( ots ) - Quietscht der Tesla der Vorderachse , ist das nicht nur unerwartet für die sonst leisen Premium-Elektroautos , sondern es weckt auch den Ehrgeiz der MEYLE Ingenieure aus Hamburg . Nachdem seit Anfang des Jahres mehr und mehr Tesla-Fahrer aus der ganzen Welt von störenden Quietschgeräuschen bei Fahrzeugen der Reihen Model 3 und Model Y berichteten , präsentiert der Ersatzteilhersteller MEYLE AG ( http : //www.meyle.com/ ) auf der Automechanika 2022 die Lösung : den neuen MEYLE HD-Querlenker für Tesla Model 3 und Model Y .
Label: Unknown

Author: hebelschein-spekulant
Title: Tesla SCHOCKIERT mit unglaublichen News: Das ist für Anleger heute ganz besonders wichtig
Text:
Für alle Aktionäre von Tesla gibt es aktuell eine Eilmeldung, die Sie jetzt unbedingt anschauen müssen. Es sind komplett neue Hintergründe, die Sie beachten müssen. Diese Prognose ist für Anleger
 von Tesla extrem wichtig, deshalb wollen wir Sie Ihnen jetzt sofort zeigen:


 Tesla hat seine Aktien gesplittet, doch welche Auswirkungen kann das auf den Aktienkurs haben?


 Der Beitrag Tesla SCHOCKIERT mit
 unglaublichen News: Das ist für Anleger heute ganz besonders wichtig erschien zuerst auf Hebelschein-Spekulant.

Author: Cornelia Mazilu
Title: Tesla construiește o fabrică de baterii, în România. Investiția depășește 90 milioane de euro
Text:
O fabrică de echipamente pentru stocarea
energiei se va construi în orașul Brăila. Compania Tesla Energy Storage va
investi peste 90 de milioane de euro. Tesla Energy Storage va construi o fabrică la Brăila FOTO: EPA-EFE Tesla Energy Storage face parte din grupul
cehesc TESLA, producător de echipamente energetice, și va construi fabrica în Zona
Liberă din orașul Brăila. Investiţia se va ridica 92 milioane de euro. Facilitățile
oferite și poziționarea i-au convins pe investitori să aleagă Brăila pentru
această uzină de echipamente pentru stocarea energiei (fabrica de baterii).
Title_without_stopwords: Tesla construiește fabrică de baterii , în România . Investiția depășește 90 milioane de euro
Text_without_stopwords: O fabrică de echipamente pentru stocarea energiei se va construi în orașul Brăila . Compania Tesla Energy Storage va investi peste 90 de milioane de euro . Tesla Energy Storage va construi fabrică la Brăila FOTO : EPA-EFE Tesla Energy Storage face parte din grupul cehesc TESLA , producător de echipamente energetice , și va construi fabrica în Zona Liberă din orașul Brăila . Investiţia se va ridica 92 milioane de euro . Facilitățile oferite și poziționarea i-au convins pe investitori să aleagă Brăila pentru această uzină de echipamente pentru stocarea energiei ( fabrica de baterii ) .
Label: Unknown
